Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/King Drive
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove and 75th due to street blockage near 75th/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove and 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
